#/usr/bin/python # ======================================================== # Generate jenkins Job for all given Servers # ========================================================
from jenkinsapi.jenkins import * from jenkinsapi.job import * import os.path import urllib2 import os
jenkisURL = Jenkins('http://52.16.252.198:8080/')
tmpStringArray = os.environ['Servers_List'].split(',')
ServerNames = tmpStringArray
for server in ServerNames: jenkisURL.build_job('CreateASDeploymentJob', {'currentJobName': server})

#/usr/bin/python # ========================================+++++++++++++++================ # Generate Block of Referece from MultiJob to exsiting Jobs # ========================================+++++++++++++++================
import fileinput import re import os
tmpStringArray = os.environ['Servers_List'].split(',') ServerNames = tmpStringArray
JobReferenceBlock = """ phaseJob('Job_Name') { parameters { propertiesFile('test.properties') } }""" # Add a new Section to the List
for server in ServerNames: with open('ListOfTaskstoAdd', 'a') as file: # Add a new Section to the List file.write(JobReferenceBlock) file.close for line in fileinput.input('ListOfTaskstoAdd',inplace=1): line = re.sub('Job_Name',server, line.rstrip()) # Set the correct job Name print(line)
